EmailTemplate.description: Use when applying Honeywell System Price per ATR Rules
EmailTemplate.name: ATR Price Adjustment
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Thank you for your recent purchase order. My name is {!Case.OwnerFirstName} and I am following up on purchase order <xxx>. We have completed processing your order and you will receive an order acknowledgement via separate email containing complete order detail. Please be advised that the total price of your purchase order did not match the current system price. The difference may affect one or more items, depending on your order. For specific item price detail, please refer to the order acknowledgement. In addition, please update pricing differences on your purchase order to ensure they reflect correctly in your system to avoid invoice payment transaction issues for this purchase
Sincerely, {!Case.OwnerFirstName}
Honeywell Aerospace Order Support Team
